alert.note: Alert for Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 15 at 3:42PM CDT until April 15 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN FRANKLIN AND EAST CENTRAL SEBASTIAN COUNTIES... At 341 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Burnville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Charleston... Greenwood... Huntington... Branch... Washburn... Burnville... Fort Chaffee... Milltown... Etna... Crossroads... Witcherville... Dayton... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
